snippet: With 243,000 jobs created in January, the economy is starting to look more positive. That might be a plus for the president in the November election.
abstract: FiveThirtyEight blog observes the economy is starting to look more positive, with 243,000 jobs created in January; holds result might be a plus for Pres Obama in the November election, as job-growth numbers do at least as well as any other economic number in predicting elections, and slightly better than some other commonly used metrics.
lead_paragraph: With 243,000 jobs created in January, the economy is starting to look more positive. That might be a plus for the president in the November election.

headline.seo: Obama’s Magic Number May Be 150,000 Jobs Per Month
headline.main: Obama’s Magic Number May Be 150,000 Jobs Per Month
headline.print_headline: Job Number That Makes The Magic For Obama
